entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
